name: PUPTALE DEMO
description:
INTRO:
Inspired by the Indie Game UNDERTALE by Toby Fox, and any choose your adventure game out there. The amazing combo of bullet-hell RPG and choose your adventure creates the UNDERTALE AU; PUPTALE

PLOT:
A long time ago two races ruled over the Earth: HUMANS and DOGS. Except, if you’ve ever played UNDERTALE, you know the rest... WAR broke out between the two races, and HUMANS won. They sealed monsters (AKA; DOGS) UNDERGROUND with a magic spell.

CONTROLS: 

Ah yes! You need to have a computer or a keyboard to play. The Arrow Keys choose which direction you will go. The Z keys lets you progress through text. Clicking things with let you interact/talk with things. You can also use your mouse (finger on mobile) that to select a option. I guess the game is actually pretty simple.

If you are interested in playing, please stay tuned! The demo is a WIP! Sorry!

CREDITS: 

UNDERTALE - Toby Fox
PUPTALE - Impossible
The Map - Impossible
Engine - Impossible
Sprites - Impossible
Most of the sounds - Toby Fox
Idea based on UNDERTALE by Toby Fox

IF THE GAME DOES NOT WORK, THEN CLICK HERE!
